summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lots 21 to 24 inclusive, Block 2, Central Park Addition; Lots 13 and 14, Block 40, South Park Addition; Lots 1 and 2, Block 8, Evan's and Blewett's Addition; the east 120 feet of Tract 25, Replat of Sander's Acre Tracts; the west 57 1/2 feet of Lots 23 and 24, Block 47, Boston Company's Plat; and the east 64 feet of Lot 7, Block 1, Gibb's Addition; with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-196 and 17-144, respectively.
